title: 標題
changeForYou: How Propbid brings the change to you
des1: ​Provide real-time property market value data in each district, analyze property auction market trends and pricing dynamics, and maximize returns.
des2: Reduce administrative cost, shorten time and increase transaction efficiency by automating auction flows
moreInfoDes1-1: PropBid empowers sellers with advanced data analytics and reporting tools, providing them with a deep understanding of market trends, bidder inclinations, and the intricacies of pricing dynamics. This enables sellers to make informed decisions backed by comprehensive market intelligence.
moreInfoDes1-2: For bidders, PropBid offers a transparent view into the property's history and details through accessible property reports. Participants can track the auction's progress with precision, review past bidding history, and stay informed with real-time notifications, ensuring they remain engaged and updated throughout the auction process.
moreInfoDes1-3: Moreover, PropBid enhances the virtual experience by offering a VR demo, allowing prospective buyers to immerse themselves in a property viewing experience that closely mirrors a physical visit, all from the comfort of their own home or office.
moreInfoDes2-1: PropBid offers a trio of sophisticated bidding options designed to enhance the user experience and provide flexibility:
moreInfoDes2-3: This feature allows bidders to place a maximum bid for an auction item in advance. The system then automatically bids on behalf of the bidder, up to their specified limit, ensuring they remain competitive in the auction without needing to constantly monitor the bidding process.
moreInfoDes2-5: Similar to proxy bidding, automatic bidding enables a hassle-free auction experience. Once set up, the system bids incrementally on behalf of the participant, maintaining their position as the highest bidder until their maximum bid is reached, allowing participants to engage in the auction without having to be present every step of the way.
moreInfoDes2-7: This digital auction format unfolds over a pre-defined period, providing a transparent and structured bidding environment. Participants can place bids at any time until the auction timer expires, offering the convenience of participating from anywhere, at any time.
moreInfoDes3-1: PropBid has structured its fee schedule to include the following components:
footerReminder: PropBid strives to ensure that the information provided on the website is up to date and accurate. We are not responsible for any inconvenience or loss caused by errors or omissions.

bidListMark: If there are identical bids, the buyer who bids first will take precedence.
